data.lyric:
[ti:tolerate it (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]tolerate it (Explicit) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:07.37]Lyrics by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:14.75]Composed by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:22.13]I sit and watch you reading with your head low
[00:28.65]
[00:30.26]I wake and watch you breathing with your eyes closed
[00:36.70]
[00:38.09]I sit and watch you
[00:40.65]
[00:41.37]I notice everything you do or don't do
[00:46.90]You're so much older and wiser and I
[00:51.51]
[00:52.22]I wait by the door like I'm just a kid
[00:57.57]
[00:58.42]Use my best colors for your portrait
[01:02.15]
[01:02.98]Lay the table with the fancy s**t
[01:06.32]
[01:07.24]And watch you tolerate it
[01:10.93]If it's all in my head tell me now
[01:14.21]
[01:14.88]Tell me I've got it wrong somehow
[01:18.75]I know my love should be celebrated
[01:22.98]
[01:23.58]But you tolerate it
[01:26.12]I greet you with a battle hero's welcome
[01:32.49]
[01:34.14]I take your indiscretions all in good fun
[01:40.51]
[01:42.15]I sit and listen
[01:44.61]
[01:45.37]I polish plates until they gleam and glisten
[01:50.30]
[01:50.84]You're so much older and wiser and I
[01:55.51]
[01:56.15]I wait by the door like I'm just a kid
[02:01.35]
[02:02.27]Use my best colors for your portrait
[02:06.02]
[02:06.90]Lay the table with the fancy s**t
[02:11.15]And watch you tolerate it
[02:14.88]If it's all in my head tell me now
[02:17.97]
[02:19.01]Tell me I've got it wrong somehow
[02:22.80]I know my love should be celebrated
[02:26.80]But you tolerate it
[02:30.64]While you were out building other worlds where was I
[02:34.10]Where's that man who'd throw blankets over my barbed wire
[02:38.25]I made you my temple my mural my sky
[02:42.24]
[02:42.84]Now I'm begging for footnotes in the story of your life
[02:46.92]Drawing hearts in the byline
[02:49.67]
[02:50.19]Always taking up too much space or time
[02:54.02]You assume I'm fine but what would you do if I
[02:58.97]
[03:02.51]Break free and leave us in ruins
[03:06.14]Took this dagger in me and removed it
[03:09.36]
[03:10.87]Gain the weight of you then lose it
[03:15.12]Believe me I could do it
[03:18.40]
[03:18.99]If it's all in my head tell me now
[03:21.79]
[03:22.92]Tell me I've got it wrong somehow
[03:26.68]I know my love should be celebrated
[03:30.87]But you tolerate it
[03:34.78]
[03:46.17]I sit and watch you
data.trans:
[ti:tolerate it (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.37]//
[00:14.75]//
[00:22.13]我静静坐着 看着你低头读书的样子
[00:28.65]
[00:30.26]我醒来 看着你双眸紧闭 平稳呼吸的样子
[00:36.70]
[00:38.09]我静静坐着 注视着你
[00:40.65]
[00:41.37]我注意到你选择做或不做的每件事
[00:46.90]你更加成熟 更加睿智
[00:51.51]
[00:52.22]我在门口等候 就像是天真无邪的孩子
[00:57.57]
[00:58.42]用我珍藏的颜料为你描绘画像
[01:02.15]
[01:02.98]用五彩斑斓的小玩意装饰餐桌
[01:06.32]
[01:07.24]看着你无限容忍的样子
[01:10.93]如果这全是我脑海里的幻想 请立刻告诉我
[01:14.21]
[01:14.88]无论如何 请指出我的错误
[01:18.75]我知道应该为我的爱庆祝
[01:22.98]
[01:23.58]但是你容忍这一切
[01:26.12]我像欢迎战斗英雄凯旋一般热情迎接你
[01:32.49]
[01:34.14]我把你的轻率之举当做是逗我开心
[01:40.51]
[01:42.15]我静静坐着 侧耳倾听
[01:44.61]
[01:45.37]我把盘子擦得闪闪发光
[01:50.30]
[01:50.84]你更加成熟 更加睿智
[01:55.51]
[01:56.15]我在门口等候 就像是天真无邪的孩子
[02:01.35]
[02:02.27]用我珍藏的颜料为你描绘画像
[02:06.02]
[02:06.90]用五彩斑斓的小玩意装饰餐桌
[02:11.15]看着你无限容忍的样子
[02:14.88]如果这全是我脑海里的幻想 请立刻告诉我
[02:17.97]
[02:19.01]无论如何 请指出我的错误
[02:22.80]我知道应该为我的爱庆祝
[02:26.80]但是你容忍这一切
[02:30.64]当你在外面建造别的世界时 我身在何处
[02:34.10]那个将毛毯扔在我的铁丝网之上的人在哪里
[02:38.25]我让你成为我的圣殿 我的画壁 我的天空
[02:42.24]
[02:42.84]如今 我请求在你的人生故事里添加注脚
[02:46.92]在署名之处画上一颗心
[02:49.67]
[02:50.19]总是占用太多空间或是时间
[02:54.02]你以为我安然无恙 但是你会怎么办
[02:58.97]
[03:02.51]如果我挣脱束缚 让我们遍体鳞伤
[03:06.14]将插进我身体的匕首取出来
[03:09.36]
[03:10.87]前一秒你倚靠于我 后一秒将你推开
[03:15.12]相信我 我可以做到
[03:18.40]
[03:18.99]如果这全是我脑海里的幻想 请立刻告诉我
[03:21.79]
[03:22.92]无论如何 请指出我的错误
[03:26.68]我知道应该为我的爱庆祝
[03:30.87]但是你容忍这一切
[03:34.78]
[03:46.17]我静静坐着 注视着你
